title: error connecting to ETH1 (on recent hotfix)
body:
OS: OSX
most recent hotfix 1.3.8
no local ETH1 connection. only infura.
-----

First time it has thrown this error on the mac. Granted this might be an infura issue also. 

-----
[2021-04-26 18:10:27]  WARN flags: Running on ETH2 Mainnet
[2021-04-26 18:10:27]  INFO node: Checking DB database-path=/Users/xxxxxxxxxxxx/Library/Eth2/beaconchaindata
[2021-04-26 18:10:27]  INFO node: Deposit contract: 0x00000000219ab540356cbb839cbe05303d7705fa
[2021-04-26 18:10:30]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for state to be initialized
[2021-04-26 18:10:30]  INFO node: Starting beacon node version=Prysm/v1.3.8-hotfix+6c0942/6c09424feb3141b96016bed817d7ade1cd75deb7. Built at: 2021-04-25 05:18:59+00:00
[2021-04-26 18:10:30]  INFO gateway: Starting JSON-HTTP API address=127.0.0.1:3500
[2021-04-26 18:10:30]  INFO rpc: gRPC server listening on port address=127.0.0.1:4000
[2021-04-26 18:10:30]  WARN rpc: You are using an insecure gRPC server. If you are running your beacon node and validator on the same machines, you can ignore this message. If you want to know how to enable secure connections, see: https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/prysm-usage/secure-grpc
[2021-04-26 18:10:30]  INFO blockchain: Blockchain data already exists in DB, initializing...
[2021-04-26 18:10:31]  INFO slotutil: Chain genesis time reached genesisStateRoot=7e76880eb67bbdc86250aa578958e9d0675e64e714337855204fb5abaaf82c2b genesisTime=2020-12-01 13:00:23 +0100 CET genesisValidators=21063
[2021-04-26 18:10:31] ERROR powchain: Could not connect to powchain endpoint error=eth1 node has not finished syncing yet
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).dialETH1Nodes
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:405
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).connectToPowChain
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:361
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).waitForConnection
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:454
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).Start.func1
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:252
runtime.goexit
	src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1371
could not dial eth1 nodes
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).connectToPowChain
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:363
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).waitForConnection
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:454
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).Start.func1
	beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:252
runtime.goexit
	src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1371
[2021-04-26 18:10:33]  INFO initial-sync: Starting initial chain sync...
[2021-04-26 18:10:33]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing required=3 suitable=0
[2021-04-26 18:10:33]  INFO p2p: Started discovery v5 ENR=enr:-LK4QFqXlKDhg2vhlJbMZw_Ri213BgDk0HHMKPU1ASt6iJESQq0LaQJbCt1LlApYXcIZp6WFwZmLQJb94VTC_GWDMEkBh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpC1MD8qAAAAAP__________gmlkgnY0gmlwhMCoALOJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQK842XygMZBBTLQvcksAHE8MPRbiWn_U3MPqaGblXCoY4N0Y3CCMsiDdWRwgi7g
[2021-04-26 18:10:33]  INFO p2p: Node started p2p server multiAddr=/ip4/192.168.0.179/tcp/13000/p2p/16Uiu2HAm891jqMdBbTbJRk9GmMURHasNYUGHvosqt4APS7JHmqAS
[2021-04-26 18:10:40]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 30 starting from  0x3e58ae4b... 1050913/1052451 - estimated time remaining 17m5s blocksPerSecond=1.5 peers=12
[2021-04-26 18:10:46]  INFO powchain: Connected to eth1 proof-of-work chain endpoint=https://mainnet.infura.io/***
It could be an infura issue , no matter how unlikely @mrabino1 . I have encountered the same error from them before, although not very often.
all good.. lets close then.. making sure you were aware.
